messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Activate your suit sensors so we can recover you if you get murdered

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Julius Rohtin. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space-winter, a whoop of rodents have stampeded into the [REDACTED].

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Central Maintenance.
